name: Roll-a-Ball+
description:
Arrow Keys or WASD to roll. Space to jump.

Made over the course of 5 to 6 hours on a Sunday for Learn a Tool or Technique Jam.

You can find the Roll-a-Ball Unity tutorial here

Features I added beyond the tutorial:

  • Sound and particle effects for picking up the yellow cubes
  • A jump function and a second floor to give it some use
